com.fluffy_minions.prototype.needsCalculators

Class TotalCaloriesCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fluffy_minions.prototype.needsCalculators.TotalCaloriesCalculator

  • public class TotalCaloriesCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores and computes the necessary calories for a person in a day.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TotalCaloriesCalculator() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double computeBMI(PersonalProfile profile)
      This method computes the body mass index for a person.
      double computeBMR(PersonalProfile profile)
      This method computes the bmr according to the gender, age, weight and height of the person.
      double computeMaxCalories(PersonalProfile profile)
      This method computes the maximum number of calories that can be eaten in a day, which is 10% more than the average number.
      double computeMinCalories(PersonalProfile profile)
      This method computes the minimum number of calories that can be eaten in a day, which is 10% less than the average number.
      double computeTDEE(PersonalProfile profile)
      This method returns the number of calories for a day according to the bmr and the bmi.
      double getBmr()
      This method returns the basal metabolic rate.
      double getMaxCalories()
      This method returns the number of maximum calories.
      double getMinCalories()
      This method returns the number of minimum necessary calories.
      double getTDEE()
      This method returns the number of necessary calories.
      void setBmr(double bmr)
      This method changes the value of the basal metabolic rate.
